attributes.action: stop the closure of woolwich docks fishery for proposed property developemet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A property developer wants to build a block of flats on the docks knocking down the club house and stopping fishing for at least 18 months. This would cause the woolwich angling club to close, causing the loss to the community of a positive facility for the youth of the area and the community  that use the fishery.
